name: The useless dungeon
description:
This was made in the span of 48h by a team of four people for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

You, a wizard, wake up in cold, gray prison cell.

Your end goal is to find a staircase and escape this slime infested dungeon.

Can you escape the dungeon in one piece?

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD or arrow keys
  • Pick up - E or left shift
  • Attack - Space

Team:

  • Thijs (composer, sound designer, audio programmer)
  • Slime (programmer)
  • Waku (programmer)
  • Ruben (sprite artist)
